<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you have a good time?
Please use our travel agency again!
We're always here to serve you!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for traveling with us today,
<MYNAME>. Please use our agency again!
We'll be glad to serve you!

That was fun!
It's late... time for bed!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, did you have a good time?
A trip for just the two of you was a bit
of a special occasion, right?
<PAGE>
Please use our travel agency again!
We're always here to serve you!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for traveling with us today,
<MYNAME>. Please use our agency again!
We'll be glad to serve you!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, did you have a good time?
A trip for the whole family is a special
time, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Please use our travel agency again!
We're always here to serve you!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for traveling with us today,
<MYNAME>. Please use our agency again!
We'll be glad to serve you!
<PAGE>
You do such special things for your
family! I'm jealous!
